description: The PMT_EOB_INFO_II table contains the Explanation of Benefits information given a transaction ID. This table contains multiple response items pertaining to PMT_EOB_INFO_I table.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of one EOB code which is different from EOB line number in PMT_EOB_INFO_I.

columns.name: AMOUNT
columns.description: The Explanation of Benefits amount for a transaction.

columns.name: EOB_CODES
columns.description: The EOB Code for this transaction.

columns.name: ADJ_PROC_ID
columns.description: The write-off adjustment code associated with the remittance code.

columns.name: ACTIONS
columns.description: The action category ID for the payment Explanation of Benefits (EOB)�action in this table. This column is frequently used to link to the ZC_TX_ACTION_TYPE table.

columns.name: SYSTEM_COMMENT
columns.description: The comment put into the systems for this transaction.

columns.name: WINNINGRMC_ID
columns.description: The winning remittance code ID from the remittance code.

columns.name: WINNINGRMC_ID_REMIT_CODE_NAME
columns.description: The name of each remittance code.

columns.name: TX_MATCH_DATE
columns.description: The date when the charge was matched to the payment.

columns.name: PEOB_EOB_RMC_IDS
columns.description: The remittance code specified by the payer in its Explanation of Benefits (EOB). If this contains a comma delimited list, we will only show the first remittance code.

columns.name: PEOB_EOB_AMOUNT
columns.description: The not allowed amount associated with the Remittance Codes that the payor specifies in its Explanation of Benefit (EOB).

columns.name: PEOB_EOB_GRPCODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The Explanation Of Benefits group code category ID for the transaction�from insurance payment posting.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Patient Responsibility


Contractual Obligation


Payor Initiated


Correction and Reversal


Other Adjustment

columns.name: PEOB_DUP_DENIAL_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item contains the duplicate denial reason calculated at the time the  payment is distributed to the invoice. It is populated only when a duplicate denial (Remittance code external ID=18) is present.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Same Payer and Suscriber on Different Coverages


Correct or Repost


Charge Router Repost


Retroadjudication


Demand Claim


Resubmit Insurance


Similar Charge on Account


Same Visit With Multiple Claims


Transfer


Same Subscriber On Different Coverages


Coverage Billed Multiple Times


Unknown
